creator: Measuring & Computing
descriptionHtml:
Stress builds up unknowingly.
Something goes wrong. In such a case.
If you can react early to the signs of imperceptible stress, you may be able to optimize your condition and prevent trouble before it happens.

App's characteristic:
Measure the degree of stress from the heartbeat obtained with your fingertips.
The result can be seen in the graph.
Estimated lines of high stress are displayed on the screen as critical levels.
(Accumulated data can be a measure of stress.)
The results can be shared on SNS.
It has a customization function that allows you to set your own normal values ​​using your own data. (Customized if certain conditions are met.)

Usage:

First, set the ID and password.
When setting a password, please use at least 8 characters.
Click the button at the top right of the screen to set your profile.
Place your index finger on the other side of the dominant arm against the camera to start measuring.
In about 2 minutes, the result will be displayed.
Degrees of stress will be displayed as a percentage (%). If you are fatigued, some advice will also be displayed.
The result history is displayed in a graph. (Click the graph icon.)
The positions where the stress level is considered to be much higher than the average are indicated as critical levels. As the data accumulates, it will be one indicator of high stress.

To customize, select customize from the icon on the upper right of the result screen, answer the question, and register the data.
If the data meets the conditions, you can set your own normal value

If the measurement is not reliable, the App will display an approximation. Please perform the measurements again according to the instructions.

Notes

The result is sometimes unstable when other applications are open or the cache of this app is full. In such a case, please close all the other applications and clear the app’s cache. (Go to Settings → app → LO2(stress checker); and clear the cache). Always measure in a bright room.

Please use mobile phone with flash light.

This app is not designed for medical use, therefore we do not take any responsibility for the action taken based on the result shown by the app. Please follow your doctor’s instruction in some cases.
descriptionShort: Measure the degree of stress from the heartbeat obtained with your fingertips

Place your index finger on the other side of the dominant arm against the camera to start measuring.
In about 2 minutes, the result will be displayed.
Degrees of stress will be displayed as a percentage (%). If you are fatigued, some advice will also be displayed.
The result history is displayed in a graph. (Click the graph icon.)
The positions where the stress level is considered to be much higher than the average are indicated as critical levels. As the data accumulates, it will be one indicator of high stress.

To customize, select customize from the icon on the upper right of the result screen, answer the question, and register the data.
If the data meets the conditions, you can set your own normal value

If the measurement is not reliable, the App will display an approximation. Please perform the measurements again according to the instructions.

Notes

The result is sometimes unstable when other applications are open or the cache of this app is full. In such a case, please close all the other applications and clear the app’s cache. (Go to Settings → app → LO2(stress checker); and clear the cache). Always measure in a bright room.

Please use mobile phone with flash light.

This app is not designed for medical use, therefore we do not take any responsibility for the action taken based on the result shown by the app. Please follow your doctor’s instruction in some cases.
descriptionShort: Measure the degree of stress from the heartbeat obtained with your fingertips

If the data meets the conditions, you can set your own normal value

If the measurement is not reliable, the App will display an approximation. Please perform the measurements again according to the instructions.

Notes

The result is sometimes unstable when other applications are open or the cache of this app is full. In such a case, please close all the other applications and clear the app’s cache. (Go to Settings → app → LO2(stress checker); and clear the cache). Always measure in a bright room.

Please use mobile phone with flash light.

This app is not designed for medical use, therefore we do not take any responsibility for the action taken based on the result shown by the app. Please follow your doctor’s instruction in some cases.
